caption: This clip features a male voice singing the main melody. Toward the end, the voice transitions to a female voice to make this sound like a duet. This is accompanied by a harp sound plucking strings. Chimes are played when the voice transitions from male to female. There is no percussion in this song. The voices are calming and relaxing. The theme of this song is romantic. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
